text: Very rude & bad staff you have, especially Sree Kumar, using another language to talk bad about me just because i change the drink..  Luckily i was able to understand. Time to change other brands

Clean & Friendly Staff. Visited at night. No complains. Brightly lit place, you surely can’t miss it.

Conveniently located. Will visit again

Must do: Rmb your loyalty credit cards / membership cards for you to earn points or enjoy rebates straight.

It is a small petrol kiosk but it has essentials that one would need when going to the petrol kiosk. They have petrol pumping, air pumping and car care services. Cheers provides essential snacks drinks and a variety of assortments that one might need on a road trip. Then again, we are in Singapore how long can your road trip be? The main reason I gave this place a five star was the toilets. They have toilets at this fine establishment which would proof to be helpful in times of crisis when you’re on the road and urgently need a toilet this is the place to go. So mark your maps for this is an establishment with a Public Toilet!
Lots of petrol pumps. Spacious. Friendly pump attendance. One man attending so many cars and yet  he has no temper. Nice old man.
Good service and variety of things to offer including petrol and diesel.
